00013 namespace PHAL {

00015 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits>
00016 GatherBasalFriction<EvalT, Traits>::
00017 GatherBasalFriction(const Teuchos::ParameterList& p,
00018                               const Teuchos::RCP<Albany::Layouts>& dl) :
00019   basalFriction  (p.get<std::string> ("Basal Friction Name"), dl->node_scalar ),
00020   numVertices(0), worksetSize(0)
00021 {  
00022   this->addEvaluatedField(basalFriction);
00023   this->setName("Gather Basal Friction"+PHX::TypeString<EvalT>::value);
00024 }
00025 
00026 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits>
00027 GatherBasalFriction<EvalT, Traits>::
00028 GatherBasalFriction(const Teuchos::ParameterList& p) :
00029   basalFriction  (p.get<std::string> ("Basal Friction Name"),p.get<Teuchos::RCP<PHX::DataLayout> >("Data Layout") ),
00030   numVertices(0), worksetSize(0)
00031 {
00032   this->addEvaluatedField(basalFriction);
00033   this->setName("Gather Basal Friction"+PHX::TypeString<EvalT>::value);
00034 }
00035 
00036 // **********************************************************************
00037 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits> 
00038 void GatherBasalFriction<EvalT, Traits>::postRegistrationSetup(typename Traits::SetupData d,
00039                       PHX::FieldManager<Traits>& fm)
00040 {
00041   this->utils.setFieldData(basalFriction,fm);
00042 
00043   typename std::vector< typename PHX::template MDField<ScalarT,Cell,Vertex>::size_type > dims;
00044   basalFriction.dimensions(dims); //get dimensions
00045 
00046   worksetSize = dims[0];
00047   numVertices = dims[1];
00048 }
00049 
00050 // **********************************************************************
00051 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits>
00052 void GatherBasalFriction<EvalT, Traits>::evaluateFields(typename Traits::EvalData workset)
00053 { 
00054   unsigned int numCells = workset.numCells;
00055   Teuchos::ArrayRCP<Teuchos::ArrayRCP<double> > wsBasalFriction = workset.wsBasalFriction;
00056 
00057   for (std::size_t cell=0; cell < numCells; ++cell) {
00058     for (std::size_t node = 0; node < numVertices; ++node) {
00059         basalFriction(cell,node) = wsBasalFriction[cell][node];
00060       }
00061     }
00062 
00063 
00064   // Since Intrepid will later perform calculations on the entire workset size
00065   // and not just the used portion, we must fill the excess with reasonable 
00066   // values. Leaving this out leads to calculations on singular elements.
00067   for (std::size_t cell=numCells; cell < worksetSize; ++cell) {
00068     for (std::size_t node = 0; node < numVertices; ++node) {
00069         basalFriction(cell,node) = basalFriction(0,node);
00070     }
00071   }
00072 }
00073 }
